name: Avenge Yourself
description:
You play a wizard sentenced to death for practicing the dark art of necromancy. Bring yourself back to life and exact vegeance on those mere mortals. 

Controls: 

* WASD - Movemnt
* Mouse - Point at things
* R - Bring corpses back to life
* LMB - Order attack
* RMB - Order retreat
* Mousewheel - Zoom

Third party assets  Sounds

* attack thud: * OtisJames - https://freesound.org/people/OtisJames/sounds/215162/
* moans: * PaulMorek - https://freesound.org/people/PaulMorek/sounds/196718/ * mrh4hn - https://freesound.org/people/mrh4hn/sounds/426628/ * mrh4hn - https://freesound.org/people/mrh4hn/sounds/426638/ * bigmonmulgrew - https://freesound.org/people/bigmonmulgrew/sounds/346625/
* dialog cont.: * davidbain - https://freesound.org/people/davidbain/sounds/136778/

* victory fanfare: * joepayne - https://freesound.org/people/joepayne/sounds/413203/
